name: Kronos: Time Titan (itch)
description:
SPECIAL NOTE: All characters depicted in the official, non-patched game and game artwork are at least 18-years-old.The version found here is not the most recent. Patreon supporters have access to the very latest version, along with special perks and in-game bonus content and abilities!You have been stripped of all your titan powers, save one: time travel. Using your one remaining power, you must travel to different places and times to conquer women and vanquish enemies in order to regain your powers. You can then use your new powers to seduce girls and destroy enemies.
Travel to different places and times to meet beautiful girls.Seduce and dominate women using your charm or power.Unlock skills (powers) which can be used to bed more difficult women or destroy powerful foes.Monthly updates unlock new periods of time and new women to conquerIf it's worth it to throw even a buck my way once a month to get some new content and be one of the guys helping this game grow into something great, please become a Patreon supporter. I really need your help joining my team of supporters by getting the word out about Kronos: Time Titan. The more support I have, the faster we can get to version 1.0 and subsequent updates!
ALPHA/BETA STAGE: Kronos is currently transitioning from alpha stage to beta stage of development, so there may be some bugs to work out, especially when new features are introduces, and the content is being expanded as well. Please be patient while I work busily to bring you new adventures and excitement, and thank you for supporting me!
You can become a Patreon supporter for as little as $1 per month and help the development of this exciting game AND download the very latest version anytime!
Click here to become a Patreon supporter.
Thank you!
The version found here is not the most recent. Patreon supporters have access to the very latest version, along with special perks and in-game bonus content and abilities!
